sentences.sContent: In the current economic climate (= conditions ), we must keep costs down.
sentences.sCn: 在当前的经济形势下，我们一定要控制好成本。

sentences.sContent: ...the Delta has become one of the leading economic regions and a major manufacturing center both of China and the world...
...it takes four to five years after economic recovery for unemployment to return to pre-crisis levels...
...Innovation is vital to driving economic progress...
...innovation is the crucial ingredient in all economic progress--higher growth for nations...
...has persuaded many observers that this shift will lead to slower economic growth...
...we derive massive economic benefits when we buy the most affordable energy on the world market and when we engage in energy trade around the world...
...The second is that our higher education system is not designed to focus on the economic consequences ofour students' years on campus...
...who despite decades of social advances still suffer from economic inequality...
...but most biofuels cause economic waste and environmental destruction...

phrases.pCn: 经济体制；经济体系，经济系统；经济制度
经济特区；经济圈；经济地带

trans.tranOther: relating to trade, in-dustry, and the management of money
